item.title: An Extensive Interview with Missouri News Horizon
item.description: When I hear all the lies, slanders, and threats against the Tea Party movement from folks on the left, I wish I could counter with a fuller examination of my beliefs. Luckily, with the help of Missouri News Horizon, I can. The Friday before the 9/12 Tea Party, I sat down with Rebecca Townsend to talk about the Tea Party. Rebecca and I chatted for an hour. She led me through just about every aspect of the Tea Party’s history up to that point.
